name: Christmas Village Creator
description:
Place over 25 different Christmas-themed objects and decorate your own "Christmas Village".

Save it, share it with others, and visit their villages to see what they made.

For the GDFG's 11th Monthly Game Jam: https://itch.io/jam/gdfgs-monthly-game-jam-11

https://github.com/HaywardMorihara/2021NovDecGameJam
